name: Hollow Hunt
description:
UPGRADE SYSTEM

Choose any of four upgrades and one of four different weapons before you start in exchange for your health. You have to choose between your upgrades and your health carefully to find the perfect balance. Fight against four dangerous type of hollows and hunt them to collect points. Try different play-styles to find what fits you the most.

CHOOSE BETWEEN 4 DIFFERENT WEAPONS

* Pistol mode with low damage and low fire rate but 0 health requirement.
* Light auto-rifle mode with the fastest fire rate but the lowest damage.
* Heavy auto-rifle mode with high fire rate and high damage.
* Sniper mode with slow fire rate but highest damage.

CHOOSE BETWEEN 4 UNIQUE UPGRADES

* Jump Upgrade: Makes you jump higher.
* Speed Upgrade: Makes you move faster.
* Increase Pickup Chance: Enemies drop more bomb and heart pickups.
* Double jump: Makes you jump twice. Unlocks only when reached 25000 score.

GAMEPLAY

Your bullets can pierce through enemy bullets so use them to protect yourself! Enemies may drop bombs, explode them with your bullets! Collect hearts from enemies to heal yourself!
Try new weapons and upgrades, dodge enemy bullets, pierce through them, show your skills in different levels and shoot'em all up!
